item.description:
For those of you who know me, my preference always is to summit mountains in New Hampshire, but I have a neglected yard that won't afford me a weekend away, so I'm trying to squeeze in a small chunk of fun between hours of raking and cleaning. So it's a very local activity this week. We'll meet at Easton's Beach on our bikes, do a loop around scenic Ocean Drive, continue to Sachuets Point, walk a two and a half mile loop around the point, and ride back to the beach. Then will have a well deserved lunch at Flos Clam Shack. Although it sounds difficult, most of the route is flat, including the walk the doesn't have a single hill much to my disappointment! The biking should total around 18 miles.
Enjoy the "promised" sunny day this Saturday by the ocean.
Paula
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the parking lot by the playground.
item.name: Keep those legs moving, bike and hike last minute gathering
